text: Patricia Healy (born February 21, 1959) is an American actress who was born in Cairo, Egypt. She began acting in 1991 as Charlene in the erotic thriller film for TV Sweet Poison, co-starring Steven Bauer and Edward Herrmann. She is known for General Hospital (in the role of Tammy Carson from March 27, 1998, to July 28, 2000), Heat (1995) and The Bodyguard (1992). ==Biography== She is the daughter of John and Herta Healy. She studied acting at the HB Studio in New York City. ==Personal life== Healy has been married since July 3, 2003, to Sergio Terrazas Torres.http://en.mm52.com/star/patricia_healy/ They have no children. ==Filmography== ===Film=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Role ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 1992 || The Public Eye ||Vera Hickson || |- |1992 || The Bodyguard ||Sound Winner #1|| |- | 1992 || Ultraviolet ||Kristin Halsey|| |- |1994 || China Moon ||Adele|| |- |1995 || Theodore Rex ||Reporter #2|| |- | 1995 || Heat ||Bosko's Date|| |- |2011 || Brando Unauthorized ||Dodie Brando|| |- |2013 || Mobster ||Servant|| |- |2014 || The Possession of Michael King ||Marsha|| |- |} ===Television=== {| class="wikitable sortable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Year ! scope="col" | Title ! scope="col" | Role ! scope="col" class="unsortable" | Notes |- | 1991 || Sweet Poison || Charlene || Television movie |- |1992 || Night Court || Miss Turnstile || Episode: "A New York Story" |- |1992 || Matlock || Randi McGowan || 2 episodes |- |1992|| Silk Stalkings || Dawn Weller || Episode: "Wild Card" |- |1993 || Sweating Bullets || Clarissa Hays|| Episode: "You Stole My Heart" |- |1993 || Johnny Bago || Valerie Carlson || Episode: "Johnny's Golden Shaft" |- |1994 || L.A.
